item.title: How Bandwidth Fosters Productivity Improvement
item.description:
Increasing your bandwidth could be one of the quickest and most affordable ways to boost employee productivity. When your LAN and WAN bandwidth are optimized to match the speed of your business operations, you remove a major obstacle to improved performance and potentially even increase your profits. While it might seem unrelated, the effectiveness of telephone and computer networks directly impacts employee performance. When considering efficiency and speed, any delay naturally hinders productivity...
